meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lee Retzlaff Alicen Nadal John Lindquist Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4404.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Lee Retzlaff, a retail salesperson from Pewee Valley, Kentucky
Alicen Nadal, an office manager from Richmond Hill, New York
John Lindquist, an attorney from Marietta, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $43,000)

tr.td: STATE HOLIDAYS
CONVERBS
NONPOTENT POTABLES
WHAT'S UP, DOC?
TV DETECTIVES
HOLMES & WATSON

tr.td: LATIN LINGO
From the Latin for "how much", it's an indivisible physical amount
John
Alicen
Lee
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $8,801
2nd place: $2,000
John
Alicen
Lee

18 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W
(including 1 DD)
